snippet.title: One True Path - Early Access Release Trailer
snippet.description:
One True Path is InnerspaceVR’s latest and most ambitious title to date in their critically-acclaimed mind-bending style. The game is full of surprises to delight new players and fans of old-school paper-and-pencil adventuring alike. 

Embark on a thrilling adventure mixing action and puzzles across fictional worlds featuring a
wild mix of visual styles, genres and gameplay. These worlds are the creation of gamebook author Jack Stevenson, a best-selling but embittered writer whose mysterious murder kicks off a fantastical journey across dimensions to uncover the dark secrets behind his final masterpiece...

Are you ready, adventurer? Your journey starts here!

Steam : https://store.steampowered.com/app/3217200/One_True_Path/
Quest : https://www.meta.com/experiences/one-true-path/7658526007582932/

---

To stay up to date about One True Path, join the community:
Our Discord: http://discord.gg/NV9VZeYAa9
TikTok: https://www.tiktok.com/@innerspacevr
X: https://x.com/innerspacevr
https://www.innerspacevr.com/one-true-path
